n = int(input())
d = {}
for i in range(n):
    name, *line = input().split()
    scores = list(map(float, line))
    d[name] = scores
name = input()
s = d[name]
avg = sum(s) / len(s)
print('%.2f' % avg)




def main():
    n, b, a = map(int, input().split()) # n = 人数、b = バッテリー、a = 残りの電池
    s = list(map(int, input().split())) # s = 人の位置
    ans = 0
    i = 0
    while i < n:
        if s[i] == 1: # バッテリーが充電できる人がいた場合
            if a < b: # 残りの電池がバッテリーより少ない場合
                a += 1
            else: # 残りの電池がバッテリーより多い場合
                b += 1
        if a > 0: # 残りの電池がある場合
            a -= 1
            ans += 1
        elif b > 0: # バッテリーがある場合
            b -= 1
            ans += 1
        else: # 残りの電池もバッテリーもない場合
            break
        i += 1
    print(ans)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

def main():
    n, b, a = map(int, raw_input().split())
    s = list(map(int, raw_input().split()))
    ans = 0
    i = 0
    while i < n:
        if s[i] == 1:
            if a < b:
                a += 1
            else:
                b += 1
        if a > 0:
            a -= 1
            ans += 1
        elif b > 0:
            b -= 1
            ans += 1
        else:
            break
        i += 1
    print(ans)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

# Считывание данных
n, b, a = map(int, input().split())
s = list(map(int, input().split()))
# Обработка данных

max_segments = 0
current_battery = b
current_accumulator = a
for i in range(n):
    if current_accumulator >= 1:
        current_accumulator -= 1
    else:
        current_battery -= 1
    if s[i] == 1:
        if current_battery < b:
            current_battery += 1
        else:
            current_accumulator += 1
    max_segments += 1
    if current_battery == 0 and current_accumulator == 0:
        break

print(max_segments)
